TABLE.NAME: local_signout_location
TABLE.COMMENT: mxschool on-campus location table - stores the locations to which students can sign out during study hours.

FIELD.NAME: deleted
FIELD.COMMENT: Whether the on-campus location record has been deleted and shouldn't be displayed.

FIELD.NAME: name
FIELD.COMMENT: The name of the on-campus location.

FIELD.NAME: grade
FIELD.COMMENT: The minimum grade of a student who is permitted to sign out to the location.

FIELD.NAME: enabled
FIELD.COMMENT: Whether the location is available for sign-out.

FIELD.NAME: start_date
FIELD.COMMENT: The timestamp of when the location should first be available - a value of NULL indicates that the location should always be available.

FIELD.NAME: end_date
FIELD.COMMENT: The timestamp of when the location should stop being available - a value of NULL indicates that the location should always be available.

TABLE.NAME: local_signout_off_campus
TABLE.COMMENT: mxschool off-campus signout table - stores the data from off-campus signout forms.

FIELD.NAME: userid
FIELD.COMMENT: The user id of the student associated with the record.

FIELD.NAME: driverid
FIELD.COMMENT: The off-campus signout id of driver record associated with the record - an equal id value and driverid value indicate that the record is a driver record.

FIELD.NAME: approverid
FIELD.COMMENT: The user id of the faculty granting permission for the record.

FIELD.NAME: deleted
FIELD.COMMENT: Whether the off-campus signout record has been deleted and shouldn't be displayed.

FIELD.NAME: type
FIELD.COMMENT: The type of the off-campus signout record. {"Driver", "Passenger", "Parent", "Rideshare", entered string}

FIELD.NAME: passengers
FIELD.COMMENT: JSON-formatted array of passengers for a driver record - a value of NULL indicates that the record is not a driver.

FIELD.NAME: destination
FIELD.COMMENT: The student's destination - a value of NULL indicates a passenger inheriting the value from the driver.

FIELD.NAME: departure_time
FIELD.COMMENT: The timestamp for departure date and time - a value of NULL indicates a passenger inheriting the value from the driver.

FIELD.NAME: sign_in_time
FIELD.COMMENT: The timestamp for when the student signed in - a value of NULL indicates that the student has not signed in.

FIELD.NAME: time_created
FIELD.COMMENT: The timestamp for when the record was first created.

FIELD.NAME: time_modified
FIELD.COMMENT: The timestamp for when the record was last modified.

KEY.NAME: student
KEY.COMMENT: The user record of the student associated with the record.

KEY.NAME: driver
KEY.COMMENT: The off-campus signout record of the driver associated with the record.

KEY.NAME: approver
KEY.COMMENT: The user record of the faculty who approved the record.

TABLE.NAME: local_signout_on_campus
TABLE.COMMENT: mxschool on-campus signout table - stores the data from on-campus signout forms.

FIELD.NAME: userid
FIELD.COMMENT: The user id of the student associated with the record.

FIELD.NAME: locationid
FIELD.COMMENT: The id of the location associated with the record - a value of -1 indicates that the 'other' option was slected.

FIELD.NAME: confirmerid
FIELD.COMMENT: The user id of the duty-person who has confirmed the record - a value of NULL indicates that the record has not been confirmed.

FIELD.NAME: deleted
FIELD.COMMENT: Whether the on-campus signout record has been deleted and shouldn't be displayed.

FIELD.NAME: other
FIELD.COMMENT: Text as an 'other' option for the location of the on-campus signout - a value of NULL indicates that the 'other' option was not selected.

FIELD.NAME: confirmation_time
FIELD.COMMENT: The timestamp for when a duty-person confirmed the record - a value of NULL indicates that the duty-person has not confirmed the record.

FIELD.NAME: sign_in_time
FIELD.COMMENT: The timestamp for when the student signed in - a value of NULL indicates that the student has not signed in.

FIELD.NAME: time_created
FIELD.COMMENT: The timestamp for when the record was first created.

FIELD.NAME: time_modified
FIELD.COMMENT: The timestamp for when the record was last modified.

KEY.NAME: student
KEY.COMMENT: The user record of the student associated with the record.

KEY.NAME: location
KEY.COMMENT: The on-campus location record of the location associated with the record.

KEY.NAME: confirmer
KEY.COMMENT: The user record of the duty-person who has confirmed the record.
